name: Accurate Information
details: Provide accurate, up-to-date, and complete health information about patients.

name: Help Health Providers
details: Helping Doctors effectively diagnose the patients, reduce errors and prescribe accurate treatments.

name: Privacy and Security
details: Enhancing privacy and security of patient and family's medical records.

name: Sharing Power
details: The ability to share personal health record anywhere at anytime via mobile for better and timely decision making.
